src:
Zlatan Ibrahimovic Kian Dekat Balik di AC Milan?
03 Nov 2019, 06:06 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Zlatan Ibrahimovic menjadi tajuk utama di beberapa media top Eropa beberapa pekan terakhir. Zlatan Ibrahimovic disebut akan kembali berkarir di Eropa dan AC Milan diyakini akan menjadi pilihan sang bomber.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic bakal segera mengakhiri karirnya di Amerika Serikat bersama LA Galaxy. Sebab, kontrak pemain 38 tahun bersama LA Galaxy bakal berakhir pada Desember 2019 ini.
Usia Zlatan Ibrahimovic memang sudah tidak lagi muda. Namun, dua musim di LA Galaxy, dia membuktikan masih berada di level atas. Pada musim 2019 ini, pemain asal Swedia mampu mencetak 31 gol di Major League Soccer [MLS].
Zlatan Ibrahimovic bisa pindah ke Eropa pada bursa transfer Januari 2020. Mantan pemain Manchester United tersebut akan berstatus free transfer dan bebas memilih klub baru, andai LA Galaxy tidak segera memberikan kontrak baru padanya.
text:
Zlatan Ibrahimovic Kian Near Back at AC Milan?
Nov 3, 2019, 06:06 by Bola.net
Soccer - Zlatan Ibrahimovic has made headlines in some of Europe's top media in recent weeks. Zlatan Ibrahimovic is said to be returning to a career in Europe and AC Milan is believed to be the bomber's choice.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic will soon end his career in the United States with LA Galaxy. Because, the 38-year player contract with LA Galaxy will end in December 2019.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic's age is no longer young. However, two seasons at LA Galaxy, he proved to still be at the top level. In this 2019 season, the Swede was able to score 31 goals in Major League Soccer [MLS].
Zlatan Ibrahimovic can move to Europe in the January 2020 transfer window. The former Manchester United player will be free transfer and free to choose a new club, if LA Galaxy does not immediately give him a new contract.
